scripts.build: tsgo && bun depc:report && (trap 'mv tsconfig.json.bak tsconfig.json' EXIT; cp tsconfig.json tsconfig.json.bak && next build --turbopack)
scripts.depc:ci: bun depc:report && bun depc:metrics && bun depc:gen
scripts.depc:gen: depcruise . -I '^src|^app' -T dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > ./dependency-graph.html && bun depc:open
scripts.depc:genl: depcruise . -I '^src|^app' -S 2 -T dot | dot -T svg | depcruise-wrap-stream-in-html > ./dependency-graph.html && bun depc:open
scripts.deploy: rm -rf ./out/ ./.next/ && bun biome:ci && bun run build && bunx gh-pages -d ./out/vislly -b gh-pages -t -m "Deploy: $(date)"
